mapper.sql: m_id, ec_id, mission_name, mission_classify, issue_date, end_date, main_info, prepay, audit_status, audit_remark, excel_url
mapper.select: select * from unaudit_mission_info WHERE (mission_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{queryStatement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR mission_classify LIKE concat(concat('%', #{queryStatement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR main_info LIKE concat(concat('%', #{queryStatement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') )
mapper.insert: insert into unaudit_mission_info (m_id, ec_id, mission_name, mission_classify, issue_date, end_date, main_info, prepay, audit_status, audit_remark, excel_url) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mainInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prepay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{excelUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update unaudit_mission_info
ec_id = #{ecId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_name = #{missionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_classify = #{missionClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
issue_date = #{issueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
main_info = #{mainInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prepay = #{prepay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
excel_url = #{excelUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
